00081 // =============================================================================
00082 double Multiply :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00083 {
00084     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00085 
00086     value1_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand1]->getValueAtSample(st);
00087     value2_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand2]->getValueAtSample(st);
00088     value3_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand3]->getValueAtSample(st);
00089     value4_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand4]->getValueAtSample(st);
00090 
00091     return value1_ * value2_ * value3_ * value4_;
00092 };
